relproducts.title: Amor Salmon Pink Vertical Blind
relproducts.description: Sweet as bubblegum and happy as a clam, the amor salmon pink is such a cheery accessory to any room. You will love it so much that from the day you put it up in your nursery it will be a slow and steady descent into pink madness until, one day, you wake up naked in a candy floss machine wondering how you let it get so bad. But that's ok. Because this pink works perfectly with neutral colours such as whites or dark greys as a loud, colourful statement piece that you physically can't tear your eyes from.

relproducts.title: Rimini Rose - Roller Blind

This blind is perfect for country chic designed rooms where it will be surrounded by cute florals and rich creams. Lovely in a bloom-filled bedroom, a light and airy hallway, or a rustic kitchen, this colour will go well with pale neutrals and country greens.

relproducts.description: Camel gold, with gentle ribbing and a silky, flawless finish, the windsor antique offers quite an aesthetic. Opt for a striking look in your master bedroom by setting the antique with a jet black shade. Pattern the walls with a gold and cream damask wallpaper, with hints of black, and choose black bedlinen and rugs, burnished with the occasional gold accent.
